articles.description: After 11 jam-packed days, Cannes Film Festival came to an end with its closing ceremony on Saturday evening.
articles.content:
After 11 jam-packed days, Cannes Film Festival came to an end with its closing ceremony on Saturday evening.
But not before handing out its highest accolade, the Palme dOr award - which director Rub… [+3384 chars]
